welcome.heading: Welcome to our website
welcome.text: We're glad you're here! We have a lot to offer, including information about our products and services, as well as resources to help you make the most of your visit.

modal.heading: Learn More
modal.text: Here is some important information about our main site and why it's beneficial to buy from us.
list: We offer a wide range of products
modal.thankyou: Thank you for considering our main site for your purchases.

buyfromus.heading: Why Buy from Our Main Site?
buyfromus.text1: When you buy from our main site, you can be sure that you're getting the best products at the best prices. Our main site offers a wide selection of products, all backed by our 100% satisfaction guarantee.
buyfromus.text2: Additionally, buying from our main site means you'll have access to our top-notch customer service team, who is always happy to help you with any questions or concerns. And, when you make a purchase on our main site, you'll be supporting our company directly, which helps us continue to bring you the best products and services.
